item.title: Static templating with handlebars, liquid and others
item.description: Templating is an proofen method to create static web pages. Typically, you write your html pages and fill in some parameters at page assembly time. Well-known templating languages are Liquid, which is written in ruby and used by Jekyll, and Handlebars, which calls itself minimal templating on steroids.

item.title: Math formulas and static web site generators
